title: Make a Restaurant Reservation
description: A hotel guest wants to make a reservation for two people at the hotel's steakhouse tonight.

tasks.description: Check the restaurant's reservation system for available tables at the guest's preferred time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the system and finds availability at 7:30 PM.

tasks.description: Book the reservation under the guest's name and room number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the reservation in the system.

tasks.description: Confirm the reservation details with the guest and ask if they have any dietary restrictions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the booking and adds a note about a gluten allergy.
